brainly_data.question:
Why was narcissistic turned into a flower? 

A. Because the 10-year journey home proved to be too strenuous 

B. Because he fell in love with his own reflection 

C. Because it was the reward for completing all of the 12 labors

D. Because he gave the gift of fire to the mortals
brainly_data.subject: History

all_answers.question:
Why was narcissistic turned into a flower? 

A. Because the 10-year journey home proved to be too strenuous 

B. Because he fell in love with his own reflection 

C. Because it was the reward for completing all of the 12 labors

D. Because he gave the gift of fire to the mortals
all_answers.subject: History
all_answers.text:
B. Because he fell in love with his own reflection.
Hope this helps!!
